summary: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.
cast: John Wayne|Richard Boone|Maureen O'Hara|Patrick Wayne|Christopher Mitchum|Bobby Vinton|Bruce Cabot|Glenn Corbett|Harry Carey Jr.|John Doucette|Jim Davis|John Agar|Gregg Palmer|Jim Burk|Robert Warner|Dean Smith|Ethan Wayne|Virginia Capers|Bill Walker|Jerry Gatlin|Don Epperson|Everett Creach|Jeff Wingfield|Hank Worden|José Ángel Espinosa 'Ferrusquilla'|George Fenneman|Bernard Fox|Pedro Galván|Tom Hennesy|'Chico' Hernandez|Roy Jenson|John Kelly|John McLiam|Anna Pavlova|Chuck Roberson|Maria Rocio|Jorge Russek|Jerry Summers|Lisa Todd|Bambino Veira
title: El gran Jack
